info.name: Detect Deprecated XSS Protection Header
author: joshlarsen
info.description: Setting the XSS-Protection header is deprecated by most browsers. Setting the header to anything other than `0` can actually introduce an XSS vulnerability.

request:
GET / HTTP/1.1
Host: rappel.conso.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip
response:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK Connection: close Transfer-Encoding: chunked Cache-Control: no-cache, no-store Content-Security-Policy: upgrade-insecure-requests; Content-Security-Policy: frame-ancestors 'none'; Content-Type: text/html; charset=utf-8 Date: Sun, 21 Aug 2022 05:42:35 GMT Pragma: no-cache Referrer-Policy: origin-when-cross-origin Server: webServer1 Set-Cookie: .AspNetCore.Antiforgery.O33mliWV2hE=CfDJ8HCNlEoOZ1pMqWt9zgJGSr6P0pNb9wdsfouboY0z-DDjardZpFoj85NH0tU9gGbrObPlhyUtf6-sarvMRvUmTVHR-qNelMk3BmXUfv-0jzHpDTLLIX4gjqJukZs0R48DozKL6Oev2hyoxRVlQsxDu28; path=/; samesite=strict; httponly Set-Cookie: BWROUTEID=3ddbb54ff84f9a8db100e8cb35c25ae2.1; Path=/; Secure Vary: Accept-Encoding X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff X-Frame-Options: SAMEORIGIN X-Xss-Protection: 1; mode=block Rappel Consommateur - Accueil

convisoappsec

info.description: This template searches for missing HTTP security headers. The impact of these missing headers can vary.

request:
GET / HTTP/1.1
Host: rappel.conso.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip
